name: Codemare (Prototype)
description:
What is Codemare?

Codemare is a game with a puzzle-programming genre, where players are required to write code/programming in order to solve problems in each level. Why do players have to write code? Because code is the most advanced tool for manipulating everything around for the sake of solving problems.

Existing Features:

- Write code to manipulate things around for the sake of solving problems.

- There are 10 levels, where almost all levels have more than one problem solution (except the first level).

- Problems at every level that are friendly for people who have never studied programming languages.
